item.title: Health care data-sharing rules touch off intense lobbying fight
item.description: The proposed rules, currently under White House review, would allow patients to access their health information and share it with third-party apps, require hospitals to send notifications of admits, discharges or transfers, penalize information blocking and allow researchers and doctors to share screenshots of software to promote safety.Story Continued Below Read on politico.com
